# Queries for the AGSUpdateEvents table

For information on using these queries in the Azure portal, see [Log Analytics tutorial](/azure/azure-monitor/logs/log-analytics-tutorial). For the REST API, see [Query](/azure/azure-monitor/logs/api/overview).


### View users who updated the dashboard  


Gets the ID's of the users who made the most recent updates, along with the version number and time.  

```query
AGSUpdateEvents
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project TimeGenerated, User, Message
| take 100
```
